info.label: Full-Stack Web Developer
info.brief: **Professional full-stack web developer and system administrator with 5 years industry, 3 years intern experience**, specializing in scalable cloud architectures for web application and network maintenance. Personal interest ranges widely from network security to algorithms. My interest into computer just keeps deepening, building small tools which makes my life easier is also something I love to do on the weekend.
info.quote: Be the change you want to see in the world.
